description: Pastas is an open source Python package for the analysis of hydrogeological time series. Using Pastas, time series models can be created and analyzed in only a few lines of Python code.
title: Pastas: open-source software for the analysis of hydrogeological time series

creators.affiliation: Institute of Earth Sciences, NAWI Graz Geocenter, University of Graz, Graz, Austria.
creators.name: Raoul Collenteur

creators.affiliation: Water Management Department, Faculty of Civil Engineering and Geosciences, Delft University of Technology, Delft, The Netherlands.
creators.name: Mark Bakker
